refund.title: Request a refund
refund.text: You can request a refund within the period stipulated by the producer.

refund_dialog.title: Verify your email
refund_dialog.text: To confirm this operation, enter the code we sent to your email:

your_purchases.title: Your purchases
your_purchases.alert: By requesting a refund, your purchase will be canceled and you will no longer have access to the product.
